attributes.action: Keep the NHS Public and free at the point of use
attributes.additional_details:
The people of this country are the only people who have not been asked about the NHS reforms currently running through parliament. I am calling for the government to call a referendum to ask the people if they want the NHS to remain a "Public Service" free at the point of use for ALL.
The people also believe by signing this petition that  the NHS reforms are ill conceived and should be dropped and the NHS funded adequately to ensure the best public service healthcare for all.
